msg: Good timeOfDay firstName, and welcome to company! Room roomNumber is now ready for you. Enjoy your stay, and let us know if you need anything.

Good timeOfDay firstName. I hope you are enjoying your stay with us at company! Just a friendly remainder that checkout is at endTimestamp. If you need to extend your stay please reach out the front deck. Enjoy the rest of your stay
Good timeOfDay firstName.Thank you for staying with company! We enjoyed having you; please come back soon!
